version_description:
• BUILD A POWERFUL CLAN WITH WORLDWIDE PLAYERS! •
Connect with friends and make new ones! Chat and engage with Clan members to exchange strategic information!

• BUILD A POWERFUL CLAN WITH WORLDWIDE PLAYERS! •
Connect with friends and make new ones! Chat and engage with Clan members to exchange strategic information! 
• BETTER GAMING EXPERIENCE! •

• We now support more languages: French, Italian, German, Spanish, Russian, Indonesian, and Malay! Come and compete with worldwide players!
• Better gaming experience!!

• You can now request and donate resources in your clan! Time to help out your friends in need!
• We now support more languages: French, Italian, German, Spanish, Russian, Indonesian, Arabic and Malay! Come and compete with worldwide players!
• Better gaming experience!
• Better gaming experience!
• Better gaming experience!

HOT, HOT, HOT! 

- Loads of all-new lava levels to put a little fire in your belly! Lava lakes, Serpents and even foul Broodmothers await the sting of your sword.
- 6 New cards, including the mighty Gatling Tower and powerful Sky Fist!

HOT, HOT, HOT!
- Loads of all-new lava levels to put a little fire in your belly! Lava lakes, Serpents and even foul Broodmothers await the sting of your sword.
- 6 New cards, including the mighty Gatling Tower and powerful Sky Fist!

New VIP Feature & Starter Kits!
- VIP Perks! Get VIP Points with every purchase made to unlock amazing VIP benefits!
- Two Starter Kits are available now! Great value for your hard earned money!

Isle of Desperation
- New campaign "Isle of Desperation" added to the Serpent Isle!
- Minor game improvements and optimization

Isle of Desperation
- New campaign "Isle of Desperation" added to the Serpent Isle!
- Minor game improvements and optimization

- New campaign "Isle of Desperation" added to the Serpent Isle!
- Minor game improvements and optimization

New Features:
- The Merchant’s store is now open! Get a chance to find those hard-to-find upgrade and evolve materials from the Merchant, offering great deals daily!
- Card Affinities! Each card now belongs to a specific class, Sun, Moon and Cloud, boosting its powers against opposing affinities.
- Crazy Mode! For those of you who think have mastered the game, get ready for Crazy Mode! Together with the Card Affinities, Crazy Mode introduces brand new challenges for even the most skilled players! Crazy Mode is unlocked after you reach Avatar level 35!
- New VIP Chest available for VIP players. It allows you to pick your card from a few different options!

Better Gaming Experience:
- A confirmation button when you buy Chests added.
- 2-, 3- and 4-Star Equipment Cards no longer require Fairy Dust to upgrade
- 4-Star Lazy towers slowdown effect fixed.
- Sky Fist now deals magic damage instead of physical damage.
- Storm Tower now requires Magmastone and Clay to upgrade instead of Obsidian and Iron.
- The drop rate of evolve materials increased.
- The amount of Gold dropped from Raid Chests increased.

New Features:
- The Merchant’s store is now open! Get a chance to find those hard-to-find upgrade and evolve materials from the Merchant, offering great deals daily!
- Card Affinities! Each card now belongs to a specific class, Sun, Moon and Cloud, boosting its powers against opposing affinities.
- Crazy Mode! For those of you who think have mastered the game, get ready for Crazy Mode! Together with the Card Affinities, Crazy Mode introduces brand new challenges for even the most skilled players! Crazy Mode is unlocked after you reach Avatar level 35!
- New VIP Chest available for VIP players. It allows you to pick your card from a few different options!

Better Gaming Experience:
- A confirmation button when you buy Chests added.
- 2-, 3- and 4-Star Equipment Cards no longer require Fairy Dust to upgrade
- 4-Star Lazy towers slowdown effect fixed.
- Sky Fist now deals magic damage instead of physical damage.
- Storm Tower now requires Magmastone and Clay to upgrade instead of Obsidian and Iron.
- The drop rate of evolve materials increased.
- The amount of Gold dropped from Raid Chests increased.

- When entering a new battle the previously used battle deck is now automatically selected.
- The Merchant now shows clearly if any materials are needed by cards that are missing resources for the upgrade.
- Clan donations no longer require a confirmation dialog.

Balance changes:
- Poison Tower damage increased.
- Gatling Tower damage decreased.
- Pirate Tower firebombs damage increased.
- Storm Tower range upgrade increased.
- Dart Tower damage increased.
- Sky Fist damage increased.
- 4-Star duplicates now give lots more gold.

Clan Improvements:
- Clans can now select an emblem that is shown on all Clan lists.
- Clan Admins now see a badge on the Settings page if the Clan has applicants waiting to be approved.
- Clans can now have a short description.
- Clans can now select their primary language.
- Clan search has been improved.

Card changes:
- Frost Storm now has a duplicate bonus which increased the duration.
- Guardian of Time now has a duplicate bonus which increased the distance it teleports enemies. The amount of enemies teleported has also been increased.

Improved Hero Cards!
- Ace, mana boost doubled
- Behemoth, regeneration rate increased.
- Blink, increased damage.
- Centurion, reduced respawn time.
- Dundee, reduced respawn time.
- Furnace, increased aura damage.
- Haunt, increased damage.
- Knuckle, improved freeze chance.
- Oni, improved chance of critical attack.
- Umbra, increased poison damage.
- Wolfric, reduced casting cost, increased ranged damage.

Other changes:
- You now see a small map of the level on the Battle Deck selector dialog.
- The Avatar dialog can now be found from the Cards dialog.
- The Merchant now has more goods for sale as well as special offers for VIP players.

Holiday Update!
■ A new Holiday Invasion will be available for all of you to play during the holidays, along with a brand new card, the Elven Rangers, which you can find only during the holidays!

Balance changes:
■ Guardian of Time now has shorter interval between teleports and longer teleport distance.
■ Holy Tower damage increased.
■ Necromancer Tower units health, damage and duration increased.

Balance changes:
- Totem of Might improved, damage boost increased, radius increased and duration increased.
- Leather Cuirass improved, increased health.
Happy Thanksgiving to all our Defense Heroes! Update the game to get some FREE goodies here, limited time offer so don't miss out!

Clan Quest
- More Leagues added.
- Various minor tweaks and improvements

Balance changes:
- Thunder Moose health doubled.
- Bladestorm now has a few more casts.
- Big Bomb now has a few more casts.
- Artillery damage increased.
- Black Dragon damage increased.
- Green Dragon damage increased.
- Red Dragon damage increased.
- Space Beam damage increased, casts increased and cost reduced.
- 2-Star Crystalline now gets a damage duplicate bonus.

Other Changes: 
- NEW VIP Feature: Smart Fill for Missions, unlocked at VIP level 11. Smart Fill selects the optimal cards that allows you to complete a mission with a 100% success rate. 
- add Thai localization.

- New Clan Quest Leagues have been added!
- New Nightmare Mode campaigns added!
- You can now see the top 5 contributors to Clan Quests.
- Fix: Changed the damage type of Snowball Tower's upgrades from magic to physical.
New Invasion is added, have fun!

CLAN QUESTS
- NEW Leagues added!
- Made small improvements to the system

NEW CAMPAIGN
- "Treetops of the Orc King" is now live! Can you reach the top?

NIGHTMARE MODE!
- Dare to face the ultimate tower defense challenge!

NEW VIP BENEFITS
- VIP only Clan Quest Arena
- Collect more Battle Tickets
- Spend Gems to refresh Clan Quest Arenas

FIXES
- Issue of the Necromancer tower not spawning skeletons has been fixed

What's New:
- A new campaign has been added on the Serpent Island, Temple Ruins.
- Summoned units now display their rate of attack.
- Unique levels with a new Boar enemy faction, featuring for the Year of the Pig.

Card tweaks
- Storm Tower fixed so that it always performs the correct number of attacks.
- Artillery now deals more damage.
- Illuminator Tower now deals more damage.
- Guardian of Time teleport distance and number of teleports increased.
- Pumpkin Bomb damage increased.
- Necromancer Tower units health and duration increased.
- Steel-Toe Boots now give the player a damage bonus.
- Boots of the March health bonus increased.
- Slippers of Swiftness damage bonus increased.
- Helm of the Valkyrie now has a health bonus.

Card balance changes:
- Sky Fist, casting cost reduced, damage increased.
- Bear Trap, damage increased.

Card balance changes:
- Sky Fist, casting cost reduced, damage increased.
- Bear Trap, damage increased.

Card balance changes:
- Sky Fist, casting cost reduced, damage increased.
- Bear Trap, damage increased.

One Year Anniversary Update!

- The Clan Chest now has a brand new card, the Space Beam, which targets all the biggest enemies on screen!
- A Bird Invasion is available, along with a brand new card, the Glyph of Fatigue, which you can find only during the event!
- The Clan Chest now gives you more Gems.
- Autoplay can now use the Mana Tower.
- There is now a small chance to get Legendary upgrade materials when playing Hard Orc Raids.
- Increased odds of receiving Epic Four-Leaf Clovers from Raids.
. Medium and Hard Orc Raid Chests no longer drop upgrade materials, instead they drop more Gold.

Card balance changes:
- Red Dragon, Green Dragon and Black Dragon damage increased.
- The blast radius now increases for Big Bomb as you rank it up.

- Happy Easter! Celebrate Easter with this update which brings a brand new Easter Invasion for you to play!
- A brand new campaign has been added to the game, a new island has been opened up and the Isle of the Horde campaign awaits.
- You can now filter your Cards on the Cards view by rarity and affinity.
- Glyph of Fatigue re-balanced, it now has a bit shorter duration.

- Happy Easter! Celebrate Easter with this update which brings a brand new Easter Invasion for you to play!
- A brand new campaign has been added to the game, a new island has been opened up and the Isle of the Horde campaign awaits. The bug has been fixed.
- A new spell card, Egg of Mana, has been added for a brand new Easter Invasion.
- You can now filter your Cards on the Cards view by rarity and affinity.
- Glyph of Fatigue re-balanced, it now has a bit shorter duration.

Balance changes
- We’ve increased the drop rate for Epic Fairy Dust

Bug fixes
- Fixed the card score for the Mana Egg

Dragon Boat Festival Update.
New VIP levels added.
The drop rates for Epic Four-Leaf Clover, Epic Rabbit Foot, Epic Lucky Dice and Epic Horseshoe have been increased.

Card changes
- Frost Storm: Max Uses are slightly reduced for the 3 and 4-Star versions.
- Furnace: Aura damage has been increased.
- Drake: A poisonous aura surrounding him has been added.
- Red Dragon, Green Dragon and Black Dragon: Their effect now cover a larger radius.

Other improvements: Autoplay useage for the Egg of Mana and Armageddon is improved.

Clan Quests are now available!

Take part in weekly Clan Quest Leagues with your entire clan to earn special rewards for all clan members! All clan members can help to contribute toward a common goal. Clans who manages to complete all quests will be rewarded with appealing rewards and be promoted to higher leagues where more tempting rewards awaits!

NEW CARDS!
- 3 new Towers are added to the game! Tech Tower, Longbow Tower, and Venom Tower are now available as Epic and Legendary cards from the Premium Chest!

Improved UI!
- The materials a card will need after a rank up is now visible prior to ranking up.

Quest Cooldown Changes
- Medium and Hard quests now refreshes every 11 hours instead of 12!

Balance changes:
- Storm Tower's damage is increased.
- Crossbow Tower's damage upgrades has been decreased, blast radius upgrade is slightly reduced.
- Guardian of Time teleport distance is improved.
- Illuminator Tower now does Pure damage.

CLAN QUESTS
- NEW Leagues added!
- Made small improvements to the system

NEW CAMPAIGN
- "Treetops of the Orc King" is now live! Can you reach the top?

NIGHTMARE MODE!
- Dare to face the ultimate tower defense challenge!

NEW VIP BENEFITS
- VIP only Clan Quest Arena
- Collect more Battle Tickets
- Spend Gems to refresh Clan Quest Arenas

FIXES
- Issue of the Necromancer tower not spawning skeletons has been fixed

- New Clan Quest Leagues have been added!
- New Nightmare Mode campaigns added!
- You can now see the top 5 contributors to Clan Quests.
- Fix: Changed the damage type of Snowball Tower's upgrades from magic to physical.
- Bug fixes.

Clan Quest
- More Leagues added.
- Various minor tweaks and improvements

Balance changes:
- Thunder Moose health doubled.
- Bladestorm now has a few more casts.
- Big Bomb now has a few more casts.
- Artillery damage increased.
- Black Dragon damage increased.
- Green Dragon damage increased.
- Red Dragon damage increased.
- Space Beam damage increased, casts increased and cost reduced.
- 2-Star Crystalline now gets a damage duplicate bonus.

Other Changes:
- NEW VIP Feature: Smart Fill for Missions, unlocked at VIP level 11. Smart Fill selects the optimal cards that allows you to complete a mission with a 100% success rate.
- add Thai localization.

Better Drop Rates.
- Increased chance to get Epic Cards from the Clan Chest.
- Increased chance to get Rare and Epic Fairy Dust.
- Increased chance to get Epic Four Leaf Clovers.

More Missions added for later Avatar levels. You can now unlock new missions at Avatar level 60, 70, 80, 90 and 100.
More Clan Quest Leagues.
Crazy Defense Heroes now supports the Vietnamese language.

Card changes:
- Steel-Toe Boots damage boost increased.
- Steel Sword damage increased.
- Salamander’s Sting now gives you a slight movement bonus.
- Heroic Halberd damage increased.
- Staff of Dawn damage increased.
- Crystalline damage increased.
- Fangblade damage increased.
- Crimson Talwar now gives you a slight health regeneration bonus

We've done a major overhaul to our Clan Quest functionality and we're happy to announce our brand new Clan Quest Season feature now! 

In Clan Quest Seasons the goal of your clan is to complete as many quests as possible during the duration of the season. By completing quests you will collect Season Tokens which can be used to obtain unique cards as well as other resources! Each Season will feature a brand new card, starting with the spell Electric Cascade!

Happy Easter! Celebrate Easter with this update which brings a new Easter Invasion for you to play!

Card balance changes
- Damage increased for Umbra.

Each Season will feature a brand new card, starting with the spell Electric Cascade!

Happy Easter! Celebrate Easter with this update which brings a new Easter Invasion for you to play!

Card balance changes

Card balance changes

Bug fixes.

We've done a major overhaul to our Clan Quest functionality and we're happy to announce our brand new Clan Quest Season feature now! 

In Clan Quest Seasons the goal of your clan is to complete as many quests as possible during the duration of the season. By completing quests you will collect Season Tokens which can be used to obtain unique cards as well as other resources! Each Season will feature a brand new card, starting with the spell Electric Cascade!

Card balance changes
- Damage increased for Umbra.
- Increased Electric Cascade spell’s damage

Bug fixes.

- The new Aurora Invasion is coming soon, where you’ll be limited to use specific cards only!
- The following equipment cards will get an HP boost: Helm of Many Eyes, Valkyrie Helmet, Vermilion Helm, Valkyrie Shield, Wooden Shield, Dragon Mail, Leather Cuirass, Vermilion Plate, Talisman of Life.
- Venom Tower gets targeting fix and cheaper upgrades.
- Bug fixes.

- The new Aurora Invasion is coming soon, where you’ll be limited to use specific cards only!
- The following equipment cards will get an HP boost: Helm of Many Eyes, Valkyrie Helmet, Vermilion Helm, Valkyrie Shield, Wooden Shield, Dragon Mail, Leather Cuirass, Vermilion Plate, Talisman of Life.
- Venom Tower gets targeting fix and cheaper upgrades.
- Bug fixes.

- The new Aurora Invasion is coming soon, where you’ll be limited to use specific cards only!
- Supreme Starter Kit is available.
- All bugs that were fixed in this release were too small for the eye to see or too fiddly for human words to describe. Nevertheless, work was done, bug fixes for Clan Quests, things tinkered with and the app became subtly better.

- The new Aurora Invasion is coming soon, where you’ll be limited to use specific cards only!
- Supreme Starter Kit is available.
- All bugs that were fixed in this release were too small for the eye to see or too fiddly for human words to describe. Nevertheless, work was done, bug fixes for Clan Quests, things tinkered with and the app became subtly better.

- New Season opens in Clan Quests, introducing a new card Shrink Curse!
- Lowered the heart cost of all invasion bosses.
- Minor prop fixes to various levels.
- Fixed Electric Cascade’s infinite targets.
- Fixed Egg of Mana’s duplicate bonus.
- Added duplicate bonus to Mana Tower.

Defenders, 
We hope that you like the new features and improvements that we’ve been steadily working on. Our team is hard at work in the lab working on more cool things for you.

- New Season opens in Clan Quests, introducing a new card Scout Tower!
- Save your game-state in the cloud via Sign-In with Apple.
- Invite your friends and collect rewards by adding them.
- More ways to get Rewards by watching videos for energy as well as login in daily.
- Our dragons were cast with an invisibility spell by evil wizards. We have fought with these wizards and made the dragon visible again for them to protect your land.
- Peter our UI designer really messed up with his well intentioned but not so well tested changes. We fixed many of them and more work is ongoing.
- Fired Peter.

Defenders, 
We hope that you like the new features and improvements that we’ve been steadily working on. Our team is hard at work in the lab working on more cool things for you.

- New Season opens in Clan Quests, introducing a new card Scout Tower!
- Save your game-state in the cloud via Sign-In with Apple.
- Invite your friends and collect rewards by adding them.
- More ways to get Rewards by watching videos for energy as well as login in daily.
- Our dragons were cast with an invisibility spell by evil wizards. We have fought with these wizards and made the dragon visible again for them to protect your land.
- Peter our UI designer really messed up with his well intentioned but not so well tested changes. We fixed many of them and more work is ongoing.
- Fired Peter.

Defenders, we heard your voices loud and clear. Peter is back!

We’ve ironed out some bugs to improve your experience.
